Author: BitsOfAByte
Name: Kiko Guide
Description:
Provides comprehensive guides for duty content such as Dungeons, Trials and Alliance Raids.

Key features:
- Automatically open a guide when entering a duty
- Neat boss mechanic tables
- A strategy "TLDR" mode
- Completely spoiler-free
- Built in guide editor
& more to come!
Punchline: The ultimate guidebook for in-game duties, great for sprouts & daily roulettes!
